content.text: Match ends, Watford 1, Swansea City 2.
Second Half ends, Watford 1, Swansea City 2.
Tom Cleverley (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Roberto Pereyra.

Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Christian Kabasele.
Attempt missed. Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Andre Gray.
Goal!  Watford 1, Swansea City 2. Luciano Narsingh (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner following a set piece situation.
Attempt saved. Nathan Dyer (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luciano Narsingh.
